result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Vue, Bee nmi

records.addlTxt: Scheduling conference on November 23, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Order Modifying Bail.
It is hereby ordered that the bail is modified to $5,000.00 recognizance with the conditions that defendant maintain absolute sobriety and have no possess of any alcohol or drugs for the reasons stated on the record on 09-13-22.

MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
Defendant in custody at Sheboygan County Jail.
The jury trial had been set for today.  It was taken off the calendar because the State did not receive the lab reports timely and therefore, could not comply with the defendant's demand for speedy trial. The State is agreeing to modification of the defendant's bail at this time.
The Court modifies the bail to $5,000.00 recognizance with the conditions that he maintain absolute sobriety and have no possession of any alcohol or drugs.  
State to draft the order.
Scheduling conference is set for 10-26-22 at 10:30 a.m.  (to reset trial)

records.addlTxt:
2:01 PM Attorney Jacalyn Christie Labre appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Brian David Van Ells appeared by video for Bee nmi Vue from Sheboygan County Detention.  Defendant currently has a prompt disposition demand with trial dates set.  State indicates that it has a conflict with the trial date set.  Court will need to address new court trial date.  Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over for further proceedings.  Arraignment held. Defendant waives the reading of the Information. Not guilty plea entered to the charge(s) contained in the Information. Defendant waives right to substitution.
Status conference scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Attorney Brian VanElls is appointed as counsel of record.  Defendant is to reimburse the county at a rate of $10.00 per month commencing 07-01-22.
Report from Public Defender indicating no attorney has been appointed yet.
Preliminary hearing on June 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

1:34 pm - Prosecuting attorney Marconi De Franca Barros in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Bee nmi Vue appeared by video, in custody at Sheboygan County Jail. Defendant requests counsel and is referred to the public defender.  Number of Manitowoc Public Defender given to defendant in court.  Since prompt disposition has been requested, court sets preliminary hearing on 05-18-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 2.  Pretrial conference is set for 07-26-22 at 11:00 a.m. and Jury trial set for 08-05-22 at 8:30 a.m. Br. 2
Bail is set at $1,000.00 cash with the conditions that he maintain absolute sobriety and have no possession of any alcohol and drugs.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
